titleStmt.title: Saptalakṣaṇavyākhyā , Vilaṃghyalakṣaṇavyākhyā āvarṇīvyākhyā Aniṃgavyākhyā. Sarvasammatalakṣaṇavṛtti Bhāradvājaśīkṣā Saptalakṣaṇavyākhyā and one unidentified text.

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a multitext manuscript. It has 8 texts in total. Text number 3 in the mansucript seems to be related to Vedic literature but it is difficult to decide. On the last folio some note is written in English. It is a list of the titles of the texts but the order of the texts is not same as this list. saptalakṣaṇavyākhyā 140 8 lines sarvasammataśīkṣāvyākhyā 40 9 lines bhāradvājaśikṣā . 12 7 lines ṣaḍviṃśalakṣaṇaśāstra .. 60 8 lines prātiśākhya 11f 7 lines āniṃgya 11 f 7 lines. One blank page before starting any new text. Foliation is separate for each text. folio numbe 7 to 16 are missing of the text 8 Saptalakṣaṇavyākhyā .

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 7 blank folio and 133 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numbers are used in the left margin. Each text has separate numeration.
supportDesc.condition: First two folio are badly broken into half. Rest folio condition is good. Some margins are broken so folio numeration is lost.

handNote.desc: confusing clusters, many times it is difficult to read.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of text3-1v , text4-1v, text 6-1v, text7-1v and text8-1v.
Text 5 has oṃ śivāya namaḥ written in the left margin on text5-1v.
